name: Name:
save pdf: Would You Like to Save an invoice as PDF as well?
item_add_error: There was an error when trying add an item. Most likely, item selection return null.
item_edition_error: There was an error when trying edit an item. Most likely, item selection return null.
saving error: There was an error when trying save an item. Save unsucessful
save pdf error: There was an error when trying to save a PDF document.
not_number_error: This is not a number. Please try again.
pdf creation error: There was an error when trying to create a PDF document. Wrong document type passed.
delete_error: There was an error when trying to delete an item. Most likely, item selection return null.
pdf print error: There was an error when trying to print a PDF document. Most likely, document not found. Check paths to it.
printer name error: There was an error when trying to get default printer name.
coma error: Your registration contains 'comma'. Delete it or check if you not missing any information.(Business customer format: VAT,NAME,ADDRESS
